reasoning_log: The matching process prioritized unique architectural features and specific furniture arrangements. Desc_1 was immediately matched to Image_1 due to the unmistakable high-ceiling/loft structure (挑高複層). Utility spaces were also highly distinct: Desc_8 matched Image_8 (enclosed metal utility balcony) and Desc_12 matched Image_12 (long, narrow kitchen with extensive cabinetry). The bedrooms required careful differentiation based on size, layout, and function. Desc_4 was identified by its '狹長型' (narrow/long) layout (Image_4). The three largest bedrooms (Desc_5, Desc_9, Desc_11, Desc_13) were separated by specific features: Image_11 showed the clearest 'home office' setup and direct balcony access (Desc_11); Image_9 featured the most prominent 'large built-in storage' (Desc_9); and Image_13 showed a clear separation into sleeping and work zones (Desc_13). Image_5 was assigned the remaining large master bedroom description (Desc_5). Finally, Desc_3 and Desc_15 were matched to Image_3 and Image_15, respectively, noting that these two images are visually identical views of the same type of bathroom setup, but must be assigned uniquely based on the provided image IDs.

matching_result_list.evidence: The image clearly displays a high-ceiling living room with a second-floor balcony/loft structure (挑高複層).
Large living space with a high volume of furniture, including a prominent massage chair, fitting the '大坪數起居空間' and '家具量大' tags.
Bathroom view showing an external window, wet/dry separation, and new, patterned floor tiles.
The perspective shows a distinctly narrow and long (狹長型) room with a full wall of built-in closets and a dedicated desk/work area.
A very large, bright bedroom with excellent natural light and implied balcony access, fitting the '採光極佳' and '房間坪數大' tags.
A smaller, square-shaped bedroom with a large window and wood flooring, suitable for a secondary room or study.
Dedicated dining area featuring a table set and built-in display/side cabinets (內建餐邊櫃).
Extremely long, narrow, enclosed space with metal framing and corrugated siding, matching the '超大工作陽台' and '結構加蓋金屬頂' tags.
Spacious bedroom featuring a prominent, wall-spanning built-in wardrobe, matching '內建大型收納櫃'.
Room currently used for storage, featuring open shelving filled with items, fitting the '多功能房/儲藏房' and '收納空間豐富' tags.
